FuncDef:
The tos command sets the ToS value for test packets.
The undo tos command restores the default ToS value.
The default ToS value is 0. The tos command sets the ToS value for test packets. The undo tos command restores the default ToS value. The default ToS value is 0. By default, the ToS value is 0.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the ToS value in test packets.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 255. The default value is 0.

Specifies the ToS value as DSCP value.
-

ExtraInfo:
ToS is an 8-bit field in the IP header. To set the ToS value for NQA test packets, run the tos command .
By configuring ToS, you can apply policy-based routing or CAR to test packets.
